snippet: A look behind the "Dancing Matt" videos; Vitamin D can help older people avoid falls; a Yahoo security breach affects Gmail, Hotmail and AOL accounts; and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: A look behind the "Dancing Matt" videos; Vitamin D can help older people avoid falls; a Yahoo security breach affects Gmail, Hotmail and AOL accounts; and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Friday Reading: A Debate Over Kids in the Front Seat
